text: What questions can I ask and what other considerations are important to make this survey effective, so that people actually fill it out?
I will be distributing it only to existing customers of my small e-product, to collect testimonials and other general information from my customer base.
I plan on using Google Docs to conduct the survey, but was wondering if someone has some good advice on questions that I can use.
Also, should I be breaking it into multiple sections/multiple pages?
